sentences.sContent: Don’t fall into the trap of becoming a mindless minion.
sentences.sContent_eng: Don’t fall into the trap of becoming a mindless minion.
sentences.sCn: 不要掉进陷阱，成了没脑子的奴才。

sentences.sContent: When you subscribe to a religion, you enroll in a mindless minion training program.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you subscribe to a religion, you enroll in a mindless minion training program.
sentences.sCn: 如果你信仰了某个宗教，就是加入了一个没脑子的奴才培训班。

sentences.sContent: Bowing with the air of one accustomed to public praise, he stole to the cavern and ordered Hagar to come forth with a commanding, "What ho, minion!
sentences.sContent_eng: Bowing with the air of one accustomed to public praise, he stole to the cavern and ordered Hagar to come forth with a commanding, "What ho, minion!
sentences.sCn: 他习以为常地躬身谢过，又轻轻走到洞穴，大模大样地命黑格出来：“呔！ 奴才！
